An elegant gift set to discover or have someone discover three new rose scents from the Fragrance Collections. Pure Rose, Les Épures de Parfum Collection We could devour it, now, raw, naked. A raw rose found in nature, bursting with life and essence that pulsates with freshness and permeates the nostrils. No frills, just the pure and simple pleasure of a hyper-realistic rose that chooses to offer up her authentic, naked truth.  L’Heure Osée, Les Heures de Parfum Collection No, this rose is not cute! It hates girly, baby doll, pastel pink or layettes. It is the pink that flushes the cheeks. It is blushing and bright, and this rose boasts only four letters: dare! Oud et Pink, Les Heures Voyageuses Collection This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the oud, rugged, gloomy and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable. L’Heure Osée, Oud & Pink, Pure Rose gift set 3 x 15 ml Pure Rose Eau de Toilette  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, EUGENOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CINNAMAL 78% VOL. Description: Feel the softness of La Panthère beneath your fingers and breathe in the warmth of its fragrance. The iconic feline-floral accord reinforces its feline grace in this new olfactory creation. Gardenia is coloured and warmed with apricot notes of osmanthus. The chypre accord intensifies, like a caress on the skin. A creation by Mathilde Laurent, Cartier perfumer.  INGREDIENTS ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL BENZOATE, CITRAL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, LIMONENE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ANISE ALCOHOL, CITRONELLOL, EUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL

A woody fragrance that dares to risk an excess of aromatics with the freshness of basil, an enveloping sensuality with the amber notes of clary sage, underlined by the elegance of cedar wood.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, COUMARIN, LINALOOL, EUGENOL, GERANIOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, CITRAL, CITRONELLOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, AMYL CINNAMAL, CINNAMAL, BENZYL CINNAMATE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, FARNESOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL

La Panthère Eau de Parfum 2x30 ml:  “Every woman has a feline aspect and every flower has a hidden animal essence.” Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer. Mathilde Laurent offers us a unique new accord, combining a flower and a sensation: a feline floral fragrance. To express femininity, she chose to explore the glory of a radiant gardenia, sensual yet delicate. To add a touch of the wild, she created a soft velvety musk. Within the flask, a sculpture depicts the majestic, fascinating panther. VIII L'Heure Diaphane Eau de Toilette 2x30 ml The world stirred, preparing its early morning with freshness and joy… Washed. That first gleam of light that caressed the eyelashes was soft peony notes, we could have bathed in the clear fountain for its transparency, for its sheer blossoming of life (ROSE). Mouth, neck and shoulders, it mingled with the air naturally, untamed and fresh LYCHEE NOTES, like a smile that still recalls the child. Everything seemed new and bright at the floral source of the silver thread AMBER WOOD of this shining HEURE DIAPHANE whose exquisite reflections dissolved everything, wrapping (IONONES) in a cloud of pure emotion.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL. *Non-contractual information

XII L'Heure Mystérieuse Eau de Parfum 2x30 ml Silence was on the prowl. You could hear it breathing, lurking like desire. The calmness felt only temporary. Drowsiness gained life, slow jasmine and heavy (PATCHOULI). This was the time for listening to your heart beat at the edge of abandon, like a reverse countdown, a voyage into the intimate where everything wraps up yet unravels. Withdraw and centre your mind on your sacred inner self, reaching in to the seat of your consciousness. Was it day (ELEMI), (CORIANDER)? Was it night (INCENSE), (FRANKINCENSE)? Soon you must leave the (JUNIPER) dusk, but not quite yet. First, savour L'HEURE MYSTÉRIEUSE for just one hour – no longer, that's a promise – extracted from deep within, and rediscover your own personal roots.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL. *Non-contractual information

Reveal the carats that shine within you.  A bouquet of fire, a thousand points of light both luminous and floral created by Mathilde Laurent, perfumer at the Maison Cartier. Faceted like a diamond, the bottle captures and fractures the light in myriad colours.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, FARNESOL

The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that wavers between mystery and sensuality. Vetiver chypre (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The milky, sweet and delicious flesh of almond appeals to the nose and stimulates the palate. Addictive and dynamic accents that announce an unexpected character. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, is here used for women, offering its bewitching and powerful, noble and untamed woody character. Benzoin tears, strange nuggets that seep from incisions made in the Styrax tree contain a tender and delicious fragrance. They bring a layer of softness and sensuality that adds comfort and depth to this secret potion, Le Baiser du Dragon.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5)

Product_Title: Oud & Amber Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance 75 ml

Description: There are moments when everything can be transformed, when it is impossible to distinguish the real from the unreal. An affair of exact seduction, leather notes, (MATÉ), (BIRCH), an object of desire (NARCISSUS), and a metamorphosis between shadow and light (BERGAMOT) is at work. This is a time for breathing in emptiness and braving adventure patchouli where LA TREIZIÈME HEURE glides sensually VANILLA and fatally upon the skin like a sentiment, an exquisite dizziness of the unknown. Then, we are no longer able to distinguish the true from the false, the night from the day, and we surrender to the realm of the vague, the clear darkness of Nature that makes everything unique and possible. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, BHT, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, COUMARIN.
Product_Title: La Treizième Heure Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: Silence was on the prowl. You could hear it breathing, lurking like desire. The calmness felt only temporary. Drowsiness gained life, slow jasmine and heavy PATCHOULI. This was the time for listening to your heart beat at the edge of abandon, like a reverse countdown, a voyage into the intimate where everything wraps up yet unravels. Withdraw and centre your mind on your sacred inner self, reaching into the seat of your consciousness. Was it day elemi gum, CORIANDER? Was it night incense, FRANKINCENSE? Soon you must leave the juniper dusk... but not quite yet. First, savour  L'HEURE MYSTÉRIEUSE for just one hour – no longer, that's a promise –  extracted from deep within, and rediscover your own personal roots. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL.
Product_Title: Heure Mystérieuse Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: Tangible, delicate, concrete reality... as long as you can find a way to reach it! Imagine if it were possible,  as a time traveller, to enter L'HEURE PERDUE –  the lost hour in which we could once again share the pleasure  of a long-forgotten childhood treat. Ah, that exquisite softness that flows from all our childhoods, from a universal memory. Where does it come from, this sensual hour with its creamy aroma, fundamental and echoing the past? From an elegant HELIOTROPINE memory, from one person's appetite to another? Voluptuous and intimate  like the scent of familiarity. Perhaps because everything is ruled by science, so clever in posing as natural when in fact it is a feat of alchemy, exploring the artificial through a precipitate of large synthetic molecules, particularly VANILLIN. This aldehyde with sensual aromas and a silky IRACINE aura floating over the lost 11th and progressive hour, demystifying the conventional idea that beauty is only worthwhile if it is NATURAL. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CINNAMAL.
Product_Title: Heure Perdue Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Rivières de Cartier Luxuriance Parfum Eau de Toilette, 2x30 ml: Generous and abundant, this fragrance is like the water of a river full of nature, fern, mastic, oak, rosemary and wild herbs. A source of wild, plant-like freshness whose primitive energy is elevated by geranium.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL.

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slide into Nécessaires à Parfum cases and are held inside by a magnetic mechanism. Infinite possibilities that allow the wearer to change fragrances at any time and from one day to the next, however they see fit. Choose from a library of fragrances.   Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum, 2x30 ml: The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that sways between mystery and sensuality. Cyprus vetiver (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The sweet, milky and indulgent flesh of the almond seduces the nose and excites the palate. Addictive and vibrant notes that get things started in an unexpected way. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, speaks directly to women here with its lofty, wild woody strength and bewitching power. The strange, nugget-like droplets of benzoin, a resin derived from the Styrax tree when cut, conceal a tender yet utterly indulgent aroma. They leave a soft and sensual film that gives this secret potion—Le Baiser du Dragon—comfort and depth.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5).
Product_Title: Les Nécessaires à Parfum Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum Refill Pack, 2x30 ml

LOVE bracelet, yellow gold 750/1000, set with 10 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.96 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

An elegant gift set to discover or have someone discover the prestigious Les Heures Voyageuses collection and its eight creations devoted to Oud resin, an emblematic and historical ingredient of the East whose natural origin is treated by Cartier with the utmost respect.   This gift set consists of 6 x 15 ml bottles: Oud Radieux, Oud & Musc, Oud & Pink, Oud & Amber, Oud & Santal, Oud & Oud  Oud Radieux Fragrance INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BHT, CITRONELLOL, ISOEUGENOL 78% VOL. An elegant gift set to discover or have someone discover three new rose scents from the Fragrance Collections. Pure Rose, Les Épures de Parfum Collection We could devour it, now, raw, naked. A raw rose found in nature, bursting with life and essence that pulsates with freshness and permeates the nostrils. No frills, just the pure and simple pleasure of a hyper-realistic rose that chooses to offer up her authentic, naked truth.  L’Heure Osée, Les Heures de Parfum Collection No, this rose is not cute! It hates girly, baby doll, pastel pink or layettes. It is the pink that flushes the cheeks. It is blushing and bright, and this rose boasts only four letters: dare! Oud et Pink, Les Heures Voyageuses Collection This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the oud, rugged, gloomy and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable. Reveal the carats that shine within you.  A bouquet of fire, a thousand points of light both luminous and floral created by Mathilde Laurent, perfumer at the Maison Cartier. Faceted like a diamond, the bottle captures and fractures the light in myriad colours.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, FARNESOL

The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that wavers between mystery and sensuality. Vetiver chypre (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The milky, sweet and delicious flesh of almond appeals to the nose and stimulates the palate. Addictive and dynamic accents that announce an unexpected character. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, is here used for women, offering its bewitching and powerful, noble and untamed woody character. Benzoin tears, strange nuggets that seep from incisions made in the Styrax tree contain a tender and delicious fragrance. They bring a layer of softness and sensuality that adds comfort and depth to this secret potion, Le Baiser du Dragon.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5)
Product_Title: Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slide into Nécessaires à Parfum cases and are held inside by a magnetic mechanism. Infinite possibilities that allow the wearer to change fragrances at any time and from one day to the next, however they see fit. Choose from a library of fragrances.   Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum, 2x30 ml: The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that sways between mystery and sensuality. Cyprus vetiver (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The sweet, milky and indulgent flesh of the almond seduces the nose and excites the palate. Addictive and vibrant notes that get things started in an unexpected way. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, speaks directly to women here with its lofty, wild woody strength and bewitching power. The strange, nugget-like droplets of benzoin, a resin derived from the Styrax tree when cut, conceal a tender yet utterly indulgent aroma. They leave a soft and sensual film that gives this secret potion—Le Baiser du Dragon—comfort and depth.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5).
Product_Title: Les Nécessaires à Parfum Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum Refill Pack, 2x30 ml

LOVE bracelet, yellow gold 750/1000, set with 10 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.96 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

Designed to be worn alone or in combination, in keeping with the oriental tradition of marrying different fragrances on the skin. Its intensity and capacity to enhance the sensual facets of each of the five other scents in the Les Heures Voyageuses collection makes this one emblematic of them all.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRONELLOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, LINALOOL, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LIMONENE, EUGENOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BHT.
Product_Title: Oud Absolu Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance

Description: Voluptuous wafts of sweet-smelling Oud resin immerse the senses, discreetly dispensing its delicate and restrained scent.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, LINALOOL, BHT, LIMONENE, EUGENOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL.
Product_Title: Oud & Musc Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance 75 ml

Description: With incandescent oud wood, Cartier refreshes the amber embers of a bouquet of freshly-picked mint leaves.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BHT, EUGENOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, ISOEUGENOL
Product_Title: Oud & Menthe Les Heures Voyageuses fragrance

Description: Cartier brings oud and amber together in a creative battle between two great fragrance legends from the East. The forces balance each other out with an addictive accord.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, FARNESOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, EUGENOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL
Product_Title: Oud & Amber Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance 75 ml

Description: There are moments when everything can be transformed, when it is impossible to distinguish the real from the unreal. An affair of exact seduction, leather notes, (MATÉ), (BIRCH), an object of desire (NARCISSUS), and a metamorphosis between shadow and light (BERGAMOT) is at work. This is a time for breathing in emptiness and braving adventure patchouli where LA TREIZIÈME HEURE glides sensually VANILLA and fatally upon the skin like a sentiment, an exquisite dizziness of the unknown. Then, we are no longer able to distinguish the true from the false, the night from the day, and we surrender to the realm of the vague, the clear darkness of Nature that makes everything unique and possible. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, BHT, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, COUMARIN.
Product_Title: La Treizième Heure Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: Silence was on the prowl. You could hear it breathing, lurking like desire. The calmness felt only temporary. Drowsiness gained life, slow jasmine and heavy PATCHOULI. This was the time for listening to your heart beat at the edge of abandon, like a reverse countdown, a voyage into the intimate where everything wraps up yet unravels. Withdraw and centre your mind on your sacred inner self, reaching into the seat of your consciousness. Was it day elemi gum, CORIANDER? Was it night incense, FRANKINCENSE? Soon you must leave the juniper dusk... but not quite yet. First, savour  L'HEURE MYSTÉRIEUSE for just one hour – no longer, that's a promise –  extracted from deep within, and rediscover your own personal roots. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL.
Product_Title: Heure Mystérieuse Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: Tangible, delicate, concrete reality... as long as you can find a way to reach it! Imagine if it were possible,  as a time traveller, to enter L'HEURE PERDUE –  the lost hour in which we could once again share the pleasure  of a long-forgotten childhood treat. Ah, that exquisite softness that flows from all our childhoods, from a universal memory. Where does it come from, this sensual hour with its creamy aroma, fundamental and echoing the past? From an elegant HELIOTROPINE memory, from one person's appetite to another? Voluptuous and intimate  like the scent of familiarity. Perhaps because everything is ruled by science, so clever in posing as natural when in fact it is a feat of alchemy, exploring the artificial through a precipitate of large synthetic molecules, particularly VANILLIN. This aldehyde with sensual aromas and a silky IRACINE aura floating over the lost 11th and progressive hour, demystifying the conventional idea that beauty is only worthwhile if it is NATURAL. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CINNAMAL.
Product_Title: Heure Perdue Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: If we were playing at being fortunate, we would dream up countless desires, longings for champagne and appearances on the arms of the most eligible. Of course, the world would be our oyster and we would explore it in our private jets. We would be diamond seekers, fond of all those sought-after fruits that are rich in carats: red redcurrant, PINK PEPPERCORN, grenadine, blue BLUEBERRY, blackcurrant, BLACKBERRY, violet, green leafy notes, IVY, boxwood, SHISO and white ALDEHYDES, polygonum. They are miracle-makers for the skin and “a girl's best friend” –  “boop boop bi doo”. Sleep in silk, live in euphoria, take baths of champagne, go out in a convertible and enrobe yourself in L'HEURE FOLLE in self-congratulation for becoming the princess of your own imperial extravagance. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL, METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL ALCOHOL.
Product_Title: Heure Folle Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: The world stirred, preparing its early morning with freshness and joy…washed. That first gleam of light that caressed the eyelashes was soft peony notes, we could have bathed in the clear fountain for its transparency, for its sheer blossoming of life ROSE. Mouth, neck and shoulders, it mingled with the air naturally, untamed and fresh lychee notes, like a smile that still recalls the child. Everything seemed new and bright at the floral source of the silver thread AMBER WOOD of this shining HEURE DIAPHANE whose exquisite reflections dissolved everything, wrapping ionones in a cloud of pure emotion. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL
Product_Title: Heure Diaphane Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: Deny yourself nothing and do not resist this desire shrouded in voluptuous mystery amber note. Yes, it is unreasonable, but it is down to that silky bronzed skin SANDALWOOD and to that soft, sun-kissed velvet, so beautiful, so warm tolu with a taste that I imagine to be all the more addictive because it is forbidden. Deny yourself nothing, yield to the magnetic aura MUSK NOTES and to the subtle scent of L'HEURE DEFENDUE, succumb to this soft, deaf temptation patchouli… Spellbound VANILLA and sweetened with absolute black cocoa. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, FARNESOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BHT, CITRONELLOL, LINALOOL, CINNAMAL, BENZYL CINNAMATE, GERANIOL, LIMONENE, EUGENOL.
Product_Title: Heure Défendue Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum 75 ml

Description: The moment was electric charged with lemon, SWEET LIME energy. The unexpected laid down the law. The start was announced. Outside, the world accelerated. The hour when everything lights up, like neon longing to consume, had arrived. Refusing to abstain from anything, invigorating yourself with acidity, feeling the vibrating rhythm of the street and pounding the asphalt in a wild yet lucid undertaking. And drinking to life gin notes, to the falling night, to parties past and to those that are yet to be invented in moments of rapture. For Time is radiant ALDEHYDES, and happiness is in tune with these bodies that are charged with fantasy, the invigorating thrill of L'HEURE BRILLANTE, which pours forth like a spicy drop. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, CITRAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, CITRONELLOL.
Product_Title: Heure Brillante Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: No, this rose is not cute! It hates girly, baby doll, pastel pink or layettes. It is the pink that flushes the cheeks. It is blushing and bright, and this rose boasts only four letters: dare! Fearless, it's the hour of the exploding rose. An unprecedented pink, in touch with its time, with what is fresh and pop.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, BHT, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRAL, EUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, FARNESOL, LINALOOL.
Product_Title: L'Heure Osée Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum

Description: As the horizon cleared, the desire for escape was stirring. Dawn or dusk? The smell of the promised land and of lucerne, of the quiver of a summer with a magnolia soul, of BERGAMOT. A moment to be seized whilst clinging to life. A note of HORSEHAIR. And they're off! Together they would spur on battles of vetiver, body to body  in MATT tanned leather and lustrous fur, both accomplices of their own kidnapping, romantic abductors of a love overflowing with musky notes. Riding at an energetic gallop, L'HEURE FOUGUEUSE, aloof and imperious with lavender, would rush to freedom, like warm hay, hit by a storm of COUMARINE and oak moss. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, FARNESOL, BHT, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, COUMARIN, EUGENOL.
Product_Title: Heure Fougueuse Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: Rosemary green and lavender blue… An old nursery rhyme leads us back  to a medicinal garden grown wild with sprightly aromatic herbs, wise plants picked to cheer body and soul.  The apothecary's prescription: an infusion of joy and courage, lentiscus, a bracing cure for the blues, THYME, a secret antidote for bitterness, verbena. And so we are born anew, in a halo of good-natured gaiety, with a teasing lash of ABSINTH green, a calm waft of lavender, when the virtuous hour chases the clouds from our spirits in a soothing ALMOND embrace… Thyme and sweet marjoram, hyssop and rue. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, AQUA WATER, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, GERANIOL, CITRAL, BHT, CITRONELLOL.
Product_Title: Heure Vertueuse Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: It was red she wanted, the blush of excitement, the tumescence of bitten lips strawberry flesh, the carnation in his buttonhole. Moving closer, driving him crazy, shedding her shyness to wrap herself in the steamy, playful, sensuous frills of CRÈME DE MARRON. No more stage fright, just a rhythmic dance in the aura of a velvet stage curtain iris notes, spotlights following her body. Look, here's my velvety shoulder CLOVE NOTES, there are my swaying curves, I vanish the better to come back to you, all legwork and pouting lips. Do you love my legs? The nape of my neck? The small of my back? Look, I'm your lover unveiled at L'HEURE CONVOITÉE,  dressed in my powdered skin, my red lingerie red rose notes flying off in a peal of laughter FRESH GREEN NOTES. And what if I said “vous” to you, just for show, like Juliette Gréco singing: “Undress me, but not too soon, not too fast, learn to covet me, captivate me!”. Déshabillez-moi, song written by Robert Nyel and composed by Gaby Verlor INGREDIENTS ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, EUGENOL, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, FARNESOL, LIMONENE, CITRAL, BHT.
Product_Title: Heure Convoitée Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Parfum 75 ml

Description: It was time to capture a life full of fresh early mornings, Petit grain, FRESH HERBS at the dawn of intentions. Everything seemed possible – love, creation, belief. The time had come to embrace the day, comforted by self-confidence and honesty IRIS, and to fly or walk in the first glimmers of a spring of existence. The sheer newness was just waiting to be explored like an undiscovered continent bathed in hope, with the promise of cherishing the moment a little longer while everything remained quiet. Prolonging, preserving the moment: L'HEURE PROMISE by Cartier. An eiderdown of fragrance sandalwood, for leaving the night behind without affronting sleep. Outside, I sense, like a veil of tulle MUSK NOTES, my own deciding scent – that of my destiny unfolding and of an adventure that is anxious to take place. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, LINALOOL, BHT, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, GERANIOL, CITRAL, EUGENOL.
Product_Title: Heure Promise Les Heures de Parfum Eau de Toilette 75 ml

Description: Natural Oud resin has the captivating magnetism of sensual, seductive sandalwood, as smooth and sweet as plum syrup.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), COUMARIN, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, EUGENOL, BHT, CITRONELLOL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL.
Product_Title: Oud & Santal Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance 75 ml

Description: This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the oud, rugged, gloomy and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, AMYL CINNAMAL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, FARNESOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL.
Product_Title: Oud & Pink Les Heures Voyageuses Fragrance

LOVE bracelet, white gold 750/1000, set with 4 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.42 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time, from one day to the next, according to your desires. A choice among a variety of fragrances in the Cartier library.  La Panthère Eau de Parfum, 2 x 30 ml: Feel the softness of La Panthère beneath your fingers and breathe in the warmth of its fragrance. The iconic feline-floral accord reinforces its feline grace in this new olfactory creation. Gardenia is coloured and warmed with apricot notes of osmanthus. The chypre accord intensifies, like a caress on the skin. A creation by Mathilde Laurent, Cartier perfumer.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BENZYL BENZOATE, CITRAL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, LIMONENE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ANISE ALCOHOL, CITRONELLOL, EUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL.

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time and from one day to the next, according to your desire. A choice among a variety of fragrances in the Cartier library.   La Panthère Eau de Parfum 2x30 ml:  “Every woman has a feline aspect and every flower has a hidden animal essence.” Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer. Mathilde Laurent offers us a unique new accord, combining a flower and a sensation: a feline floral fragrance. To express femininity, she chose to explore the glory of a radiant gardenia, sensual yet delicate. To add a touch of the wild, she created a soft velvety musk. Within the flask, a sculpture depicts the majestic, fascinating panther.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, BHT, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI EXTRACT, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 15510 (ORANGE N°4), CI 17200 (RED N°33), CI 14700 (RED N°4). *Non-contractual information
Product_Title: La Panthère Eau de Parfum Refill Pack 2x30 ml

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time and from one day to the next, according to your desire. A choice among a variety of fragrances.  VIII L'Heure Diaphane Eau de Toilette 2x30 ml The world stirred, preparing its early morning with freshness and joy… Washed. That first gleam of light that caressed the eyelashes was soft peony notes, we could have bathed in the clear fountain for its transparency, for its sheer blossoming of life (ROSE). Mouth, neck and shoulders, it mingled with the air naturally, untamed and fresh LYCHEE NOTES, like a smile that still recalls the child. Everything seemed new and bright at the floral source of the silver thread AMBER WOOD of this shining HEURE DIAPHANE whose exquisite reflections dissolved everything, wrapping (IONONES) in a cloud of pure emotion.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL. *Non-contractual information
Product_Title: VIII L'Heure Diaphane Eau de Toilette Refill Pack 2x30 ml

Baiser Volé Eau de Parfum 2x30 ml: The fragrance of a majestic yet elusive flower: the lily is recreated for the first time from the freshness of the leaf, the floral scent of the petal and the powdery fragrance of the stamen. “For this fragrance, I wanted to recreate the scent of flower garlands around the neck.” Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer. Description: 30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time and from one day to the next, according to your desire. A choice among a variety of fragrances.  XII L'Heure Mystérieuse Eau de Parfum 2x30 ml Silence was on the prowl. You could hear it breathing, lurking like desire. The calmness felt only temporary. Drowsiness gained life, slow jasmine and heavy (PATCHOULI). This was the time for listening to your heart beat at the edge of abandon, like a reverse countdown, a voyage into the intimate where everything wraps up yet unravels. Withdraw and centre your mind on your sacred inner self, reaching in to the seat of your consciousness. Was it day (ELEMI), (CORIANDER)? Was it night (INCENSE), (FRANKINCENSE)? Soon you must leave the (JUNIPER) dusk, but not quite yet. First, savour L'HEURE MYSTÉRIEUSE for just one hour – no longer, that's a promise – extracted from deep within, and rediscover your own personal roots.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL. *Non-contractual information
Product_Title: XII L'Heure Mystérieuse Eau de Parfum Refill Pack 2x30 ml

A woody fragrance that dares to risk an excess of aromatics with the freshness of basil, an enveloping sensuality with the amber notes of clary sage, underlined by the elegance of cedar wood. Product_Title: Eau de Parfum Noir Absolu La Panthère

Description: An elegant gift set to discover or have someone discover the Les Épures de Parfum collection, through three pieces of invisible jewellery: Pure Rose, Pur Muguet and Pur Magnolia to celebrate the original resonance and beauty of nature...  This gift set consists of 3 x 15 ml bottles: Pure Rose, Pur Muguet and Pur Magnolia.   Pure Rose Eau de Toilette INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, EUGENOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CINNAMAL 78% VOL.  Pur Muguet Eau de Toilette INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, EUGENOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL 79% VOL.  Pur Magnolia Eau de Toilette INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CINNAMAL, BHT, CITRAL, EUGENOL 79% VOL.
Product_Title: Les Épures de Parfum - Pure Rose, Pur Muguet, Pure Magnolia gift set, 3 x 15 ml

Description: A contemporary vision of this historic vase; unprecedented realism that has been pushed to the extreme. Lily-of-the-valley: bare.   INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BHT, EUGENOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL
Product_Title: Les Epures de Parfum Pur Muguet Eau de Toilette

Description: A magnolia without romance for a change, as if hanging from a tree, refined with freshness and full of radiance.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CINNAMAL, BHT, CITRAL, EUGENOL
Product_Title: Les Epures de Parfum Pur Magnolia Eau de Toilette

Description: The fragrance of a majestic yet elusive flower: the lily is recreated for the first time, from the freshness of the leaf, the floral scent of the petal and the powdery fragrance of the stamen.  “For this fragrance, I wanted to recreate the scent of flower garlands around the neck”. Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer.  INGREDIENTS*: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), BENZYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LINALOOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, GERANIOL, CITRONELLOL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL, BHT, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 60730 (EXT. VIOLET 2).
Product_Title: Baiser Volé Limited Edition Eau de Parfum

Description: We could devour it, now, raw, naked. A raw rose found in nature, bursting with life and essence that pulsates with freshness and permeates the nostrils. No frills, just the pure and simple pleasure of a hyper-realistic rose that chooses to offer up her authentic, naked truth.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, EUGENOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CINNAMAL.
Product_Title: Les Epures de Parfum Pure Rose Eau de Toilette

Description: A limited-edition travel format for you or your loved ones to discover Oud & Pink. This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the Oud, rugged, gloomy and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable.  Oud & Pink Fragrance INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, AMYL CINNAMAL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, FARNESOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL.
Product_Title: Les Heures Voyageuses Oud & Pink Limited Edition Fragrance

Description: A limited-edition travel format for you or your loved ones to discover Oud & Ambre. Their raw qualities reveal their basic truth — oud and amber naturally join together and illuminate one another. The charm works its magic, a noble oud wood becomes sensual with the lightly spiced sweetness of amber.  Oud & Amber Fragrance INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, FARNESOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, EUGENOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL.
Product_Title: Les Heures Voyageuses Oud & Ambre Limited Edition Fragrance

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time and from one day to the next, according to your desire. A choice among a variety of fragrances in the Cartier library.  Oud & Santal Perfume 2x30 ml: The natural Oud resin has a captivating magnetism that is combined with sweet and syrupy sandalwood to enhance its fullness and powerful sensuality. Description: Elegant Cartier fragrance discovery set with festive decoration for you or your loved ones. This set contains a Rivières de Cartier Insouciance 100 ml Eau de Toilette as well as two Rivières de Cartier Luxuriance and Rivières de Cartier Allégresse 10 ml Purse Sprays.  RIVIERES DE CARTIER INSOUCIANCE EAU DE TOILETTE:  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LINALOOL, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL  RIVIERES CARTIER ALLÉGRESSE EAU DE TOILETTE:  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LINALOOL, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRAL, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL  RIVIERES DE CARTIER LUXURIANCE: INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL
Product_Title: Rivières de Cartier Insouciance Eau de Toilette gift set, Rivières de Cartier Luxuriance and Rivières de Cartier Allégresse 10 ml Purse Sprays.

Description: Generous and complex, this fragrance evokes a river brimming with nature, fern, lentiscus, oak, rosemary and wild herbs. A source of natural and wild freshness whose primitive energy is magnified by the geranium. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL.

Beautiful and joyful, the river quivers with delight as a tuberose passes by. Leaf after leaf, petit-grain and bergamot, the river flourishes vivaciously, bathing in the radiant, fresh notes. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LINALOOL, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRAL, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BHT, BENZYL BENZOATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL.

Free and sweet, this gentle river sparkles in the reflection of the sun's rays. Bouncing off blooming flowers, irises and violets, it glistens in the cool shade of the fruit trees. INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LINALOOL, LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL.

With an airy, woody fragrance, the L’Envol de Cartier Eau de Parfum gives its wearers the strength to push themselves beyond their limits. The nectar is imbued with a tang of lignum vitae and notes of honey, brought out by a wispy haze of musk.   INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, COUMARIN, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BHT, FARNESOL, ISOEUGENOL, CITRAL, GERANIOL, CI 15985 (YELLOW N°6), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 14700 (RED N°4)
Product_Title: L'Envol de Cartier Eau de Parfum

Description: A uniquely sensual fragrance that combines the fresh green notes of galbanum with the floral opulence of jasmine and the sweetness of vanilla.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, COUMARIN, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, CITRONELLOL, BHT, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, BENZYL CINNAMATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 17200 (RED N°33), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 60730 (EXT. VIOLET 2).
Product_Title: Must de Cartier Eau de Toilette

Description: A fragrance of unparalleled elegance with vanilla and powdery notes; enhanced by refreshing green notes of galbanum.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, COUMARIN, LINALOOL, AQUA (WATER), BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, BENZYL CINNAMATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, BENZYL ALCOHOL, EUGENOL, DISODIUM EDTA, BHT, ISOEUGENOL, CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 17200 (RED N°33)

An energised and invigorating version of Pasha de Cartier Edition Noire. The fougère accord and cedar depth are refreshed by a citrus sea mist with fruity overtones.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, LINALOOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, COUMARIN, BHT, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, GERANIOL, DISODIUM EDTA

Description: LOVE bracelet, white gold 750/1000, set with 10 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.96 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

Description: A fresh perfume, spicy and woody with the power and majesty of cedar, brightened with cardamom.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, COUMARIN, GERANIOL, CITRAL, BENZYL BENZOATE, FARNESOL.

Déclaration Parfum is modelled after the Eau de Toilette, a natural olfactory continuation with accents of wood, balsamic, leather, and spice notes. The latest declaration that’s deeper and more intense.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, CITRONELLOL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, COUMARIN, CINNAMAL, CITRAL, GERANIOL, FARNESOL, ISOEUGENOL, CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 17200 (RED N°33), CI 42090 (BLUE N°1)

This new variation shows us a second nature that is as botanical as it is vivacious. It enriches the palette of this spicy and woody scent, both emblematic and elegant, known for its olfactory intensity. Lending a vivacity to the original ingredients of Déclaration Eau de Toilette, the fragrance blooms again, unprecedented and like a new spring. The cedar is brimming with sap, the spices are fresher, the citrus leaves are greener and more delicate... a true explosion of life! The beauty and simplicity of this freshness is reflected in the new colouring of the bottle, which is tinted green with shades of blue and grey, tailored to match the elegance of this scent.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), LIMONENE, LINALOOL, CITRAL, CITRONELLOL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, GERANIOL, COUMARIN, FARNESOL

Every woman has a feline aspect and every flower has a hidden animal essence.  Mathilde Laurent, Cartier Perfumer  Mathilde Laurent offers a unique new accord, combining a flower and a sensation: a feline floral fragrance. To express femininity, she chose to explore the glory of a radiant gardenia, sensual yet delicate. To add a touch of the wild, she created a soft velvety musk. Within the flask, a sculpture depicts the majestic, fascinating panther.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, BHT,EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, ISOEUGENOL, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5), CI 15510 (ORANGE N°4), CI 17200 (RED N°33), CI 14700 (RED N°4).

The fragrance of a majestic yet elusive flower: the lily is recreated for the first time, from the freshness of the leaf, the floral scent of the petal and the powdery fragrance of the stamen. The fragrance of a majestic lily enhanced with tonka bean and powdery hints of heliotropin. An abundance of lilies with velvety petals, more sensual than ever, like a touch of balm on the skin. A creation by Mathilde Laurent, Cartier perfumer. Description: A limited-edition travel version embellished with a peacock-feather motif, for you or your loved ones to discover Oud & Ambre. Their raw qualities reveal their basic truth — oud and amber naturally join together and illuminate one another. The charm works its magic, a noble oud wood becomes sensual with the lightly spiced sweetness of amber.  Oud & Amber Fragrance INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), LINALOOL, FARNESOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, EUGENOL, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL.
Product_Title: Les Heures Voyageuses Oud & Ambre Limited Edition Fragrance

Description: A limited-edition travel version embellished with a peacock-feather motif, for you or your loved ones to discover Oud & Pink. This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the oud, rugged, gloomy, and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable.  Oud & Pink Fragrance INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, FRAGRANCE, WATER, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, LINALOOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, EUGENOL, AMYL CINNAMAL, CINNAMYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CITRAL, LIMONENE, BENZYL BENZOATE, FARNESOL, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL.

Description: This scented case will whisk you away to a beautiful meadow with flowers blooming as far as the eye can see, drawn to the bright, radiant daylight. A floral explosion for the eyes; a bouquet the size of a meadow whose fresh morning air brings waves of glorious scents This candle is designed to be lit by itself or alongside others to create a unique, original and personalised olfactory landscape.  Here are some tips to help you use your candle properly: When you light it for the first time, let it burn for a minimum of three hours so that a layer of fully liquid wax forms on the surface.  After each use, be sure to recentre the wick and trim it to a centimetre in height.  This reusable ceramic case is a signature Cartier piece.

This fragrant case will make you soar through the treetops like a bird. The array of botanical, woody, fresh and vibrant scents is utterly majestic. High up in the air, the fresh air brings with it the complex aroma of this blend of various foliage. This candle is designed to be lit by itself or alongside others to create a unique, original and personalised olfactory landscape.  Here are some tips to help you use your candle properly: When you light it for the first time, let it burn for a minimum of three hours so that a layer of fully liquid wax forms on the surface. After each use, be sure to recentre the wick and trim it to a centimetre in height. This reusable ceramic case is a signature Cartier piece.

This fragrant case will whisk you away to a sandy landscape, where the blazing sun warms the dunes on the horizon. With its undulating, wave-like ridges, this sea of sand exudes a slow, soft and warm breeze with an amber-like glow. This candle is designed to be lit by itself or alongside others to create a unique, original and personalised olfactory landscape.  Here are some tips to help you use your candle properly: When you light it for the first time, let it burn for a minimum of three hours so that a layer of fully liquid wax forms on the surface. After each use, be sure to recentre the wick and trim it to a centimetre in height. This reusable ceramic case is a signature Cartier piece.

Description: LOVE bracelet, rose gold 750/1000. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

Strap in black alligator skin, yellow gold 750/1000 ardillon buckle.   Movement diameter: 20.5 mm, movement thickness: 2.15 mm, balance: 21,600 vibrations/hour, power reserve approx. 38 hours.  Case dimensions: 39.49 mm x 29.2 mm, thickness: 6.09 mm. Limited edition of 150 individually numbered timepieces. Water-resistant up to 3 bar (approx. 30 metres).

Tank Cintrée Skeleton watch, Manufacture mechanical movement with manual winding, calibre 9917 MC. Platinum case, beaded crown set with a sapphire cabochon, blued-steel sword-shaped hands. Black alligator-skin strap, white gold 750/1000 double adjustable folding buckle. Hours and Minutes. Skeletonised and curved movement following the shape of the case, the barrel and the balance are inclined so they can follow the shape of the movement. Individually numbered movement consisting of 142 parts, including 21 jewels. Movement length: 33.75 mm, movement width: 19.60 mm, movement thickness: 3.84 mm, frequency: 28,800 vibrations/hour, power reserve approx. 60 hours. Mineral crystal, sapphire case back. Case thickness: 9 mm. Not water-resistant.

Coussin de Cartier watch, medium model, quartz movement. Water-resistant up to 3 bar (approx. 30 metres).

Baignoire watch, mini model, quartz movement. Case and 12-sided crown set in rhodium-finish white gold 750/1000 set with 42 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.50 carats. Silvered sunray effect dial. Water-resistant to 3 bar (approx. 30 metres).

LOVE bracelet, rose gold 750/1000, set with 4 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.42 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

LOVE bracelet, rose gold 750/1000. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

LOVE bracelet, small model, rose gold 750/1000. Supplied with a screwdriver. Width: 3.65 mm (for size 17). Now available in a slimmer version, Cartier continues to write the story of the LOVE bracelet. The closure is designed with a functional screw on one side of the bracelet and a hinge on the other. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

LOVE bracelet, rose gold 750/1000. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.

An elegant gift set to discover or have someone discover three new rose scents from the Fragrance Collections. Pure Rose, Les Épures de Parfum Collection We could devour it, now, raw, naked. A raw rose found in nature, bursting with life and essence that pulsates with freshness and permeates the nostrils. No frills, just the pure and simple pleasure of a hyper-realistic rose that chooses to offer up her authentic, naked truth.  L’Heure Osée, Les Heures de Parfum Collection No, this rose is not cute! It hates girly, baby doll, pastel pink or layettes. It is the pink that flushes the cheeks. It is blushing and bright, and this rose boasts only four letters: dare! Oud et Pink, Les Heures Voyageuses Collection This rose plays with gender, mixing both the floral and the masculine, the rough and the smooth. A men's rose for women who wear men's fragrance, who flirt with ambivalence, plunge into the oud, rugged, gloomy and wear a dinner jacket with nothing underneath. Unstoppable. L’Heure Osée, Oud & Pink, Pure Rose gift set 3 x 15 ml Pure Rose Eau de Toilette  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, EUGENOL, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, CITRAL, CINNAMAL 78% VOL. Eau de Parfum L'Heure Osée  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, WATER, FRAGRANCE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, GERANIOL, BHT, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, CITRAL, EUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, FARNESOL, LINALOOL. 78% VOL. Description: Feel the softness of La Panthère beneath your fingers and breathe in the warmth of its fragrance. The iconic feline-floral accord reinforces its feline grace in this new olfactory creation. Gardenia is coloured and warmed with apricot notes of osmanthus. Description: 30 ml glass refills that slip into the cases of the Nécessaires à Parfum thanks to a magnet. Infinite possibilities allowing you to change perfume at any time, from one day to the next, according to your desires. A choice among a variety of fragrances in the Cartier library.  La Panthère Eau de Toilette 2 x 30 ml: Unleash your inner feline and exude gentle charm. A radiant aroma of white flowers washes over La Panthère, Cartier’s iconic feline-floral perfume, turning this new Eau de Toilette into floral freshness. Ethereal gardenia blends with crystalline musk for a delicate fragrance full of feline grace, created by Mathilde Laurent, Cartier perfumer.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, AQUA (WATER), PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), BENZYL BENZOATE, LINALOOL, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, BHT, GERANIOL, EVERNIA PRUNASTRI (OAKMOSS) EXTRACT, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, CITRAL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5).

Reveal the carats that shine within you.  A bouquet of fire, a thousand points of light both luminous and floral created by Mathilde Laurent, perfumer at the Maison Cartier. Faceted like a diamond, the bottle captures and fractures the light in myriad colours.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, GERANIOL, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, LIMONENE, CITRONELLOL, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, CITRAL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, ISOEUGENOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, FARNESOL

The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that wavers between mystery and sensuality. Vetiver chypre (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The milky, sweet and delicious flesh of almond appeals to the nose and stimulates the palate. Addictive and dynamic accents that announce an unexpected character. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, is here used for women, offering its bewitching and powerful, noble and untamed woody character. Benzoin tears, strange nuggets that seep from incisions made in the Styrax tree contain a tender and delicious fragrance. They bring a layer of softness and sensuality that adds comfort and depth to this secret potion, Le Baiser du Dragon.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5)
Product_Title: Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum

Description: 30 ml glass refills that slide into Nécessaires à Parfum cases and are held inside by a magnetic mechanism. Infinite possibilities that allow the wearer to change fragrances at any time and from one day to the next, however they see fit. Choose from a library of fragrances.   Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum, 2x30 ml: The sophisticated elegance of a fragrance that sways between mystery and sensuality. Cyprus vetiver (almond, vetiver, benzoin). The sweet, milky and indulgent flesh of the almond seduces the nose and excites the palate. Addictive and vibrant notes that get things started in an unexpected way. Vetiver, which traditionally appeals to men, speaks directly to women here with its lofty, wild woody strength and bewitching power. The strange, nugget-like droplets of benzoin, a resin derived from the Styrax tree when cut, conceal a tender yet utterly indulgent aroma. They leave a soft and sensual film that gives this secret potion—Le Baiser du Dragon—comfort and depth.  INGREDIENTS: ALCOHOL, PARFUM (FRAGRANCE), AQUA (WATER), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, LIMONENE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, ETHYLHEXYL SALICYLATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE, GERANIOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE, ISOEUGENOL, COUMARIN, BENZYL BENZOATE, EUGENOL, CITRAL, FARNESOL, BHT, CI 14700 (RED N°4), CI 19140 (YELLOW N°5).
Product_Title: Les Nécessaires à Parfum Le Baiser du Dragon Eau de Parfum Refill Pack, 2x30 ml

LOVE bracelet, yellow gold 750/1000, set with 10 brilliant-cut diamonds totalling 0.96 carats. Comes with a screwdriver. Width: 6.1 mm. Created in New York in 1969, the LOVE bracelet is an icon of jewellery design: a close fitting, oval bracelet composed of two rigid arcs which is worn on the wrist and removed using a specific screwdriver. The closure is designed with two functional screws placed on either side of the bracelet: you will need help to open or close it. To determine the size of your LOVE bracelet, measure your wrist, adding one centimetre to your size for a tighter fit, or two centimetres for a looser fit.
